CustomField.description:
For US Address Verification.
strict - The API will return detailed output only if a valid match is found. invalid - The API will return detailed output for both valid and invalid addresses. enhanced - The API will return detailed output based on a more aggressive matching mechanism. Only available with us-core-cloud license.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
For US Address Verification.
strict - The API will return detailed output only if a valid match is found. invalid - The API will return detailed output for both valid and invalid addresses. enhanced - The API will return detailed output based on a more aggressive matching mechanism. Only available with us-core-cloud license.
CustomField.label: SmartyStreets Match Method
